4.25.19  1:18 pm   hey man, thank you so much for making at the airport terminal. i have a family member who travels constantly and it really complicates our relationship, and my life has been taking a really jagged path these days and it's hard to feel like there's a purpose or give myself permission to be quietly satisfied with the process when i'm yanking myself all over the place by my own chain. at the airport terminal scratches both those itches for me, so to speak. i've been watching/listening to it a lot this week and it's really been nice. <3
